newsitem.title: USA: U.S. bulk millfeeds - Prices mixed in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: U.S. bulk millfeeds - Prices mixed in quiet trade.

text.p: Millfeed prices were mixed on Tuesday in lackluster activity, several dealers said.

"The feed business seems to have calmed. We have a normal five to five-and-one-half work week for the feed mills. Demand seems to be just a little dull this first full week after the holidays," a Buffalo dealer said.
Flour mills were trying to find price levels, he said.
"We have not seen a great deal of volume yet on a Tuesday which is not unusual, he added, expecting a pickup in trade later this week," he said.
